nodes.text: G-400 was the name of a type of starfighter used by the Lok Revenants.
The G-400 starfighter was a single-seat fighter with two engines. It was equipped with a single laser cannon and deflector shields and also utilized a hyperdrive.

One G-400 helped the pirate Nym take down a Trade Federation Superfreighter over Lok in 32 BBY. It apparently proved popular among the Revenants, since it was the most common starfighter in their use ten years later.
This starfighter was first used in the video game Star Wars: Starfighter and again in its sequel. It is an NPC wingmate.
